title: "Daten "
format: html

<div class="iframe-wrap">
  <iframe id="data-iframe"
          src="./data/data.html"
          loading="lazy"
          width="100%"
          height="900"
          style="border:0;"
          referrerpolicy="no-referrer">
  </iframe>
</div>

<script>
(function() {
  function resizeIframe(el) {
    try {
      // gleicher Origin (GitHub Pages gleicher Host): Höhe automatisch setzen
      var doc = el.contentDocument || el.contentWindow.document;
      var h = Math.max(
        doc.body.scrollHeight || 0,
        doc.documentElement.scrollHeight || 0,
        600
      );
      el.style.height = (h + 20) + "px";
    } catch (e) {
      // Cross-Origin: nichts zu tun, fallback-Höhe bleibt
    }
  }
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    var ifr = document.getElementById('data-iframe');
    if (ifr) ifr.addEventListener('load', function () { resizeIframe(ifr); });
  });
})();
</script>

<style>
.iframe-wrap { width: 100%; }
.iframe-wrap iframe { width: 100%; display: block; }
</style>
